charpoly_to_matrix:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `matrix.mul -/

/-- `charpoly f` is the characteristic polynomial of the matrix of `f` in any basis. -/
@[simp]
theorem charpoly_to_matrix {ι : Type w} [fintype ι] (b : basis ι R M) : (to_matrix b b f).charpoly = f.charpoly :=
  by
  set A := to_matrix b b f
  set b' := choose_basis R M
  set ι' := choose_basis_index R M
  set A' := to_matrix b' b' f
  set e := basis.index_equiv b b'
  set φ := reindex_linear_equiv R R e e
  set φ₁ := reindex_linear_equiv R R e (equiv.refl ι')
  set φ₂ := reindex_linear_equiv R R (equiv.refl ι') (equiv.refl ι')
  set φ₃ := reindex_linear_equiv R R (equiv.refl ι') e
  set P := b.to_matrix b'
  set Q := b'.to_matrix b
  have hPQ : matrix.mul (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)) (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q)) = 1 := by
    rw [ring_hom.map_matrix_apply, ring_hom.map_matrix_apply, ← matrix.map_mul,
      @reindex_linear_equiv_mul _ ι' _ _ _ _ R R, basis.to_matrix_mul_to_matrix_flip, reindex_linear_equiv_one, ←
      ring_hom.map_matrix_apply, RingHom.map_one]
  calc
    A.charpoly = (reindex e e A).charpoly := (charpoly_reindex _ _).symm
    _ = (scalar ι' X - C.map_matrix (φ A)).det := rfl
    _ = (scalar ι' X - C.map_matrix (φ (matrix.mul (matrix.mul P A') Q))).det := by
      rw [basis_to_matrix_mul_linear_map_to_matrix_mul_basis_to_matrix]
    _ = (scalar ι' X - C.map_matrix (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (φ₁ P) (φ₂ A')) (φ₃ Q))).det := by
      rw [reindex_linear_equiv_mul, reindex_linear_equiv_mul]
    _ = (scalar ι' X - matrix.mul (matrix.mul (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)) (C.map_matrix A')) (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q))).det := by
      simp
    _ =
        (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (scalar ι' X) (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P))) (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q)) -
            matrix.mul (matrix.mul (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)) (C.map_matrix A')) (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q))).det :=
      by rw [matrix.mul_assoc ((scalar ι') X), hPQ, matrix.mul_one]
    _ =
        (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)) (scalar ι' X)) (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q)) -
            matrix.mul (matrix.mul (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)) (C.map_matrix A')) (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q))).det :=
      by simp
    _ = (matrix.mul (matrix.mul (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)) (scalar ι' X - C.map_matrix A')) (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q))).det := by
      rw [← matrix.sub_mul, ← matrix.mul_sub]
    _ = (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)).det * (scalar ι' X - C.map_matrix A').det * (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q)).det := by
      rw [det_mul, det_mul]
    _ = (C.map_matrix (φ₁ P)).det * (C.map_matrix (φ₃ Q)).det * (scalar ι' X - C.map_matrix A').det := by ring
    _ = (scalar ι' X - C.map_matrix A').det := by rw [← det_mul, hPQ, det_one, one_mul]
    _ = f.charpoly := rfl
    
#align charpoly_to_matrix charpoly_to_matrix
